snippet: GABEL-- Ivan Herzog, Age 84, of Jenkintown, PA died on June 11, 2016 after a lengthy illness. A memorial service will be held at Congregation Rodeph Shalom, Philadelphia, PA on June 14, 2016 at 12:00 Noon followed by a meal of consolation at the synagogue. www.levinefuneral.com 1/3
lead_paragraph: GABEL-- Ivan Herzog, Age 84, of Jenkintown, PA died on June 11, 2016 after a lengthy illness. A memorial service will be held at Congregation Rodeph Shalom, Philadelphia, PA on June 14, 2016 at 12:00 Noon followed by a meal of consolation at the synagogue. www.levinefuneral.com 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GABEL, IVAN HERZOG
